name: Music To My Eyes
desc: A full stack MERN dating app that allows users to create profiles, add songs to their music playlist and match with others based on similar characteristics and music taste!

name: Mouldy Potatoes
desc: Mouldy Potatoes is a Movie review site that alows users to add, edit, delete reviews of any movie they have watched. There is also the option for users to comment on other reviews

name: AstroSearch
desc: Astrosearch allows users to gain up-to-date astronomical info and images including NASA's Picture of the Day when a date is selected as well as rise and set times of sun/moon.

name: Weather Dashboard
desc: The Weather Dashboard allows users to see current weather and 5 day forecast of a city of their choice. This app makes use of the OpenWeather API to retrieve weather information

name: Fitness Tracker
desc: The Fitness tracker allows users to create their workouts and track their progress throughout the day or week

name: Employee Directory
desc: An app that will allow users to able to view their entire employee directory at once to easily access each employee's info

name: Google Books Search
desc: A MERN app that allows users to search books using Google API and they can save them to their favourites.
